Articles.Content:
Banned for mentioning the abomination that is the game.

I AM THE NIGHT AND THE SHADOW, AND I DO NOT PLAY "THE GAME".

Banned for mentioning the abomination that is the game.

I AM THE NIGHT AND THE SHADOW, AND I DO NOT PLAY "THE GAME".

Banned for many reasons, some seen and some hidden.
Banned for quoting his post to reveal the hidden text.
Banned for openly talking about the hidden text.

Banned for hypocrisy.

The shadows creep throughout the deeps of the darkest worlds, waiting for their chance to strike...
Banned for 'that' corrupt a wish post...
Banned for not being banned.

Banned for banning my superior.

Banned for 'that' corrupt a wish post...

Awwwww, you still remember that? Did you not sleep for a day or two?
Banned for being famous
Banned for being completely dishonest.
Banned for replying to my post
Banned because i care about that guy
Banned because you're me
Banned for answering yourself as if you have a alternate personality.

Banned for being canadian.

(Canada is actually a good country from what i hear, unlike this RURAL PRISON IN ARKANSAS!!!)
Banned for being unpatriotic
Banned for banning a person that complimented Canada. Also punished by eating a bowl of 3 day old poutine that's been left out on the counter.
Not banned, but promoted for being canadian.
Banned for failing to ban the person above you.
Banned for no reason at all.
Banned for all possible and impossible reasons.
Banned because you're a SPY!
Banned for being on the Mun. Duna is the place to go!
Banned for mentioning The Cursed Planet.

Banned because the Superbowl is today, the Bronk-who's and the Seattle Whatchamacallits are playing football. Not the type of football with the black and white ball being kicked around, but the leather non-spherical ball that people throw and clobber each other over. Who decided on calling that game football anyway?

BTW, you don't need to land on other planets if you live in a place as amazing as I do. (I live on the roof of the VAB)

The one problem with living there is sometimes I need to move out of the way when a rocket lands/crashes there.
